LanguageData.Lunararchitecture.label: Lunar Architecture
LanguageData.Lunararchitecture.description: Not implemented: Studying lunar building techniques and structures.
LanguageData.Lunarsewing.label: Lunar Clothing
LanguageData.Lunarsewing.description: Make a lunar tailoring bench, and tailor various garments designs specifically for rabbie colonists.
LanguageData.Lunarmachining.label: Lunar Machining
LanguageData.Lunarmachining.description: Make a lunar machining table, used to craft rabbie military apparel and armour.
LanguageData.RBPDW.label: Lunar Gunsmithing
LanguageData.RBPDW.description: Craft simple rabbie firearms such as the PDW Sub Machinegun.(PDW:Personal-Defense-Weapon)
LanguageData.Moonthread.label: Moonthread Weaving
LanguageData.Moonthread.description: Weave together Moonthread using a composite material made of fiber and silver, used in making traditional rabbie garments.
LanguageData.RBFieldWeapon.label: Rabbie Field Weapon
LanguageData.RBFieldWeapon.description: Not implemented: Allows the Rabbies to craft field weapons of the Lunar Empire.\nA weapon system specialized in fending off multiple weak enemies. It is relatively inexpensive and uses live ammunition.
LanguageData.ElectrothermalChemical.label: Electrothermal Chemical Gun Upgrade
LanguageData.ElectrothermalChemical.description: Not implemented: The ammo of Rabbie Field Weapons will be upgraded chemically. Attachinging this module to a weapon will result in a powerful damage, penetration and accuracy boost.
LanguageData.RBFieldGear.label: Rabbie Combat Gear
LanguageData.RBFieldGear.description: Craft power armor, field vests and flak jackets designed specifically for rabbie colonists.
LanguageData.EFClothing.label: Lunar Functional Clothing
LanguageData.EFClothing.description: Tailor clothing designed for rabbies that protect from the heat and cold as well as increasing work productivity.
LanguageData.RefinePlanetarium.label: Planetarium
LanguageData.RefinePlanetarium.description: Learn to gather raw planetarium from the air and refine it into refined planetarium; a mineral drug necessary for rabbie survival.
LanguageData.Planettea.label: Planetarium Brewing
LanguageData.Planettea.description: Brew refined planetarium into a euphoric but extremely addictive Planetarium Tea.
LanguageData.Planetcocktail.label: Planetarium Cocktails
LanguageData.Planetcocktail.description: Not implemented: Learn how to make the cocktail "Blue Planet" by mixing alcohol and planetarium.
LanguageData.officiaryclothing.label: Lunar Officer Clothin
LanguageData.officiaryclothing.description: Tailor high-end rabbie clothing worn by scientists, doctors and military officers.
LanguageData.RBheavyindustry.label: Heavy Lunar Industry
LanguageData.RBheavyindustry.description: Not implemented: Create advanced mechanical equipment, defensive turrets, and firepower-enhancing racks with the heavy industry technology of the Lunar Empire.
LanguageData.RBEnergyweapon.label: Lunar Energy Weapons
LanguageData.RBEnergyweapon.description: Not Implemented: Single-shot energy rifle, the first energy weapon developed by the Rabbie Lunar Empire.
LanguageData.NanoBreeder.label: Lunar Nanomachines
LanguageData.NanoBreeder.description: Not implemented: Creating nanomachines for ultra-precision machine tools.
LanguageData.Massrefinery.label: Planetarium Mass Refinery
LanguageData.Massrefinery.description: Not implemented: Research techniques for refining large amounts of planetarium.
LanguageData.RBMoonsilk.label: Moonsilk Weaving
LanguageData.RBMoonsilk.description: Craft Moonsilk, a rare industrial product of the Rabbie Lunar Empire. It is a powerful and beautiful fabric spun by nanomachines.
LanguageData.Specialclothing.label: Lunar Special Clothing
LanguageData.Specialclothing.description: Not Implemented: Craft high-performance suits and clothing worn by the Rabbie Lunar Empire Special Forces.
LanguageData.RBregularweapon.label: Rabbie Charge Firearms
LanguageData.RBregularweapon.description: Not Implemented: Craft powerful energy grenades.
LanguageData.RBpowerarmor.label: Rabbie Powered Armor
LanguageData.RBpowerarmor.description: Build Rabbie Power Armour and Powered Armour Helmets.
LanguageData.RBsuperaccel.label: Rabbie Rail Cannons
LanguageData.RBsuperaccel.description: Not implemented: The latest railgun technology by the Rabbie Lunar Empire Weapon Design Bureau. Allows to craft super-accelerated electromagnetic weapons with overwhelming range and penetration. Their ultra-fast bullet speed turns charged particles into plasma, reducing the time it takes to land significantly.
LanguageData.RBArmoredweapon.label: Lunar Armored Weapon
LanguageData.RBArmoredweapon.description: Not implemented: Craft piloted battle suits for combat.
